alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 6:29PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of northwestern Lake, east central Sanders and southwestern Flathead Counties through 715 PM MST... At 629 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an intense snow shower 19 miles west of Big Arm, or 25 miles west of Polson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rocky Point, Jette, Big Arm, Proctor, Lakeside, Lake Mary Ronan, Elmo, Niarada, Dayton, Rollins and Lonepine. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 62 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region
